    ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig.Builder
    forceWaves(boolean forceWaves)
    Apply a randomly increasing & decreasing integer translate to every entry of the heightmap to create a more variable terrain.
    ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig.Builder
    hardSpikeBaseMultiple(int hardSpikeBaseMultiple)
    The base multiple of the hard spike, which is multiplied by the delta between adjacent height entries.
    ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig.Builder
    hardSpikeChance(float hardSpikeChance)
    The chance of a hard spike being applied to the heightmap, rolled on every x index of the heightmap.
    ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig.Builder
    hardSpikes(boolean hardSpikes)
    Enable a chance to apply a multiplier to a delta between adjacent height entries which permanently affects all future entries.
    ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig.Builder
    smoothPathing(boolean smoothPathing)
    Whether to dampen the terrain heightmap to make a very low chance of a delta > 1 between adjacent height entries.

  • Method Details

    • smoothPathing

      public ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig.Builder smoothPathing(boolean smoothPathing)
      Whether to dampen the terrain heightmap to make a very low chance of a delta > 1 between adjacent height entries.

    • hardSpikes

      public ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig.Builder hardSpikes(boolean hardSpikes)
      Enable a chance to apply a multiplier to a delta between adjacent height entries which permanently affects all future entries.

    • hardSpikeChance

      public ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig.Builder hardSpikeChance(float hardSpikeChance)
      The chance of a hard spike being applied to the heightmap, rolled on every x index of the heightmap.

    • hardSpikeBaseMultiple

      public ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig.Builder hardSpikeBaseMultiple(int hardSpikeBaseMultiple)
      The base multiple of the hard spike, which is multiplied by the delta between adjacent height entries. Final multiple does have randomization applied.

    • forceWaves

      public ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig.Builder forceWaves(boolean forceWaves)
      Apply a randomly increasing & decreasing integer translate to every entry of the heightmap to create a more variable terrain.

      public ProceduralTerrainInterpolationConfig build()
